last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 37: Reunion
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ariana Madix reunites the Season 6 Islanders to discuss the most dramatic moments of the season.

name: Love Island
overview: American version of the British dating reality competition in which ten singles come to stay in a villa for a few weeks and have to couple up with one another. Over the course of those weeks, they face the public vote and might be eliminated from the show. Other islanders join and try to break up the couples.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: Set in Fiji, season 6 features a brand-new vibrant villa including a spicy Casa Amor and an unforgettable Hideaway. Islanders face more drama than ever before with jaw-dropping revelations, brand new couples challenges and even a few surprise guests.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The summer of love is officially underway as the islanders arrive at their beautiful beachside Villa; it doesn't take long for them to couple up, but when a surprise islander moves in, someone might go home before they have time to unpack.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: After Kyra choses the guy she wants to couple up with, one female Islander is left riding solo while some of the other pairs start to rethink their choices.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: When two new male Islanders (Dylan and Cormac) walk into the Villa, the girls see potential options while the guys smell competition.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Dylan spends some alone time with Mallory, while Cormac attempts to steal Elizabeth from Zac; the male islanders must overcome an assault obstacle course before everyone braces for the season's first recoupling ceremony.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Yamen starts to build a deeper connection with Alana, while Caro gets to know Cormac a little better; all the islanders band together for Weston's birthday, which is upstaged by the arrival of two new female islanders.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The two new girls don't get the warmest reception from some of the female islanders, but the boys more than make up for it; after spending time with Christen, Cashel and Yamen start to second-guess their current romantic situations.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Yamen and Weston cuddle up to Christen and Katrina while Alana and Mallory spend an unromantic night together; after a comical competition empowers all the girls, each boy takes control at a recoupling ceremony that sends two packing.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Winston arrives at the Villa looking for love and ready to abandon his single status; a few couples get real about their relationships while an R-rated challenge raises everyone's heart rates.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Caro starts to fall for Cormac, but she questions whether the feelings are mutual; Zac and Elizabeth can't stop gushing over each other; the islanders compete in a food-themed challenge; Arielle appears for an unexpected dumping.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: After the recoupling ceremony, Kyra cools things off with Cashel and Zac asks Elizabeth to be his girlfriend; six new islanders enter the Villa, and quickly start to drive a wedge between a few of the couples.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Not everyone in the Villa is excited to welcome the new islanders into their abode, but nerves seem to settle after all they all play a game; Weston can't deny his attraction to Kelsey, while Eric makes a beeline for Caro and Kyra.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Eric's ego continues to polarize the Villa, but his self-confidence has a positive impact on Kyra; Elizabeth and Zac get some time away; their post-date euphoria is interrupted when Arielle shows up to announce an unexpected dumping.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: It's time to recouple and the results lead to one boy being dumped from the island; the islanders find out what America thinks about them and the sentiments aren't all positive.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Yamen grows increasingly frustrated when some of the Islanders accuse him of being a player, while Weston and Kelsey embark on a romantic (and restorative) date that brings them closer together. Then, an unexpected dumping leaves the entire Villa shook.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: The Villa deals with the fallout from Katrina and Cashel's dumping, which provokes Kyra to push Eric away; the arrival of three new islanders lifts everyone's spirits until one bombshell threatens to break up more than a few couples.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Eric tries to rebound from Kyra, but he's not the only one with a crush on Emily; Caro starts to vibe with Ray, but can't deny her attraction to Anton; Weston appeared to find his dream girl with Kelsey, but looks can be deceiving.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: A savage recoupling ceremony sends three Islanders packing and the remaining pairs reeling. Plus, Ray and Caro check into the Hideaway for a passionate evening alone, but it's Weston and Emily's steamy PDA session that has the whole Villa buzzing.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Weston looks like Emily's dream guy until the girls tell her about the good old boy's less attractive qualities. Feeling duped, Emily confronts her new boo, who doesn't take kindly to his character being questioned and does whatever he can to save face. But will it be enough to stay in the Villa with Emily?

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: As we inch closer to the finale, the Islanders say goodbye to yet another couple before embarking on their craziest challenge yet-parenting! Lucky for Caro, her knack for baby talk with Ray helps them win a gold star for guardianship. Unfortunately, jubilation is fleeting because another dumping is right around the corner.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: The Villa gets two more vacancies when America chooses which four couples make it to the finale. Meanwhile, Kyra gets a little help from cupid (or the production team) when she unexpectedly reunites with her true love. Plus, two couples set out on their final dates and both end in tears--but, like, in a good way.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: The last two couples go on their final dates before a surprise visit from their nearest and dearest. While some parents can't wait to set a wedding date for the dreamy duos, others are a lot more skeptical that these relationships are built to last. With only one episode left, who will America vote as the winning couple?

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Day 31 at the villa in Fiji. America votes to choose the winning couple.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: After months spent in isolation and virtual dating, a new batch of eleven singles prepare to find their perfect matches. Moving into the gorgeous 'Love Island' villa, each one is looking for a real romantic connection.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: New couplings are afoot when Kierstan and Rachel enter the Villa with bikinis blazing. For Justine, that means a friendship might be tested, but she doesn't lament too long before finding herself wrapped in another boy's strong arms.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Love continues to blossom between Moira and James, while Connor is smitten by Mackenzie. Tre is caught between his attraction to Kaitlynn and respect for Justine.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: There are tears all round as the first recoupling takes place. Later, two new boys arrive at the Villa, and neither are afraid to step on a few toes.

episodes.name: More to Love 1
episodes.overview: A look at the best moments from the past week, plus previously unseen footage, commentary and interviews.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Moira and Calvin appear smitten with each other, but James won't go down without a fight. Elsewhere, Tre looks forward to seeing more of Justine, but Caleb makes his move first.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A light-hearted game of Truth Or Dare gets heavy when Connor kisses another girl and Mackenzie turns into a green-eyed monster. Then, the recoupling ceremony ends in tears-lots and lots and lots of tears-when the Islanders say goodbye to two boys.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: With James and Jeremiah out of the villa, the remaining islanders cuddle in their couples and bask in an unexpected moment of calm, until new girl Lauren magically appears by the pool and seems to have more than a few boys under her spell.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: While on a date with Lauren, Connor admits to feeling smothered by Mackenzie, but the 23-year-old auditor acts way differently once he's back in the Villa; Tre tries to recover from his recent conflict with Justine by grafting a new girl.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Kierstan and Carrington gallop towards a new level of intimacy, but it might not be enough to stop his wandering eye; Johnny and Cely continue to strive for power-couple status; Moira doubts where she really stands with Calvin.

episodes.name: More to Love 2
episodes.overview: From Lauren driving all the boys crazy to Mackenzie putting her crazy on full display, catch up with More To Love, a two-hour recap that zips through Week 2's hottest gossip and treats fans to never-before-seen footage.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Mackenzie and Connor spend a night in the Hideaway, which leaves a bad taste in the mouths of Calvin and Moira; Carrington continues to send Kierstan mixed signals and a surprise re-coupling sends the Islanders reeling.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: The future of two couples is put in the hands of the other Islanders who are forced to decide who gets a second chance at love and who is sent home; the remaining couples indulge in a delicious marriage-themed challenge.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: The Islanders bend and stretch during a lovely poolside yoga class that also offers up a well-needed dose of inner peace, which is about to be tested when the boys and girls are separated for a few days.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: While spending quality time in the company of five new boys, it seems like Mackenzie has momentarily forgotten about Connor, especially when Jalen starts showing her attention; Johnny can't stop locking lips with Mercades.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Mackenzie has a difficult time remembering Connor, thanks to Jalen; though, Connor might not be experiencing the same kind of memory loss at Casa Amor; Johnny decides between Mercades and Cely, who's still in the dark about her man.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Carrington goes on a hot date with Mercades, which shakes Laurel's confidence, while Johnny insists he only has eyes for Cely. (Funny how he came to that realization AFTER sucking face with someone else.) Then, back at the Villa, Moira and Mackenzie continue to go gaga over the new boys, but are they sensing lust or love?

episodes.name: More to Love 3
episodes.overview: Carrington goes on a hot date with Mercades, which shakes Laurel's confidence, while Johnny insists he only has eyes for Cely. (Funny how he came to that realization AFTER sucking face with someone else.) Then, back at the Villa, Moira and Mackenzie continue to go gaga over the new boys, but are they sensing lust or love?

Distance makes the heart grow fonder for some Islanders but not for everyone; Cely can't wait to reunite with Johnny; but when she finds out he wasn't exactly chaste at Casa Amor, the only thing she wants is space.

Justine and Caleb enjoy a romantic poolside date, in which they dig into their feelings for each other and discuss how they'd make a long-distance relationship work. Back at the Villa, Mackenzie can't understand why Jalen is being distant.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: It's official: Jalen and Mackenzie are over before ever really getting started, which is moderately fine for the big-eyed blonde because she's experiencing dumper's remorse about Connor. If only he wasn't interested in taking his friendship with Moira to the next level

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: An unexpected visit from Arielle sends four Islanders packing, which leaves just enough room in the Villa for three new boys to sneak in. For Kierstan, this trio offers multiple reasons to get over Carrington, but Johnny isn't as enthused.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: The curse of Casa Amor continues to haunt the Islanders, especially Johnny and Cely, whose relationship is the worse for wear after more than a few punches to the gut. Meanwhile, Kierstan explores her connection with new boy Bennett.

episodes.name: More to Love 4
episodes.overview: From Carrington romancing new girl Laurel to Johnny revealing the cracks in his confidence, catch up with More To Love, a weekly recap that zips through Week 4's hottest gossip and treats fans to never-before-seen footage.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Cely and Johnny continue to run in circles about Casa Amor, while Laurel starts to doubt whether Carrington is the right boy for her. Connor lets Moira down gently, which is encouraging for Calvin.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: At the latest re-coupling ceremony, Moira has to choose between two incredible options, Connor and Calvin, but it's new boy Bennett who's giving her butterflies. Meanwhile, Johnny and Cely move beyond Casa Amor.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: For new girls Lakeyn and Julia, Carrington is the most delicious-looking man on the menu, so they each order him to accompany them on a beautiful mountainside date. Know who's lost her appetite? Laurel, who can't stomach the thought of her other half choosing fresh meat over her

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Johnny asks Cely to be his girlfriend, and the entire Villa celebrates. The romantic gesture isn't lost on Justine and Caleb, who continue to grow closer. As for Carrington, his head is turning more in the direction of Lakeyn.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: The girls go to great lengths to complete a mission in the Villa that rewards the Islanders with an ice-cream social. Sadly, the good humor doesn't last long when a re-coupling forces Carrington to choose between three girls.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: Lakeyn confronts Carrington about his decision to choose Laurel instead of her; the Islanders rally around Moira after she gets some harsh feedback during a challenge; one pair of love birds are invited to spend the night in the Hideaway.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: Even though the couples have only been dating for a short time, the true test of any relationship is how they behave once introduced to each other's families; Carrington and Johnny get grilled by the parents they meet.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: Simulation babies are delivered to the couples and some Islanders welcome the parental challenge, while some fail to keep their infant in one piece. The season's end creeps up fast when a re-coupling sends two last people packing.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: The final couples each embark on one last epic date before moving out of the Villa. From driving dream cars to taking helicopter rides, strolling down candlelit halls to sharing private dances, the Islanders say goodbye to Vegas in style.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: The four remaining couples relive some of the most memorable moment in the Villa before Arielle Vandenberg announces the winning couple.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Host Arielle Vandenberg and narrator Matthew Hoffman return with even more love and romance this summer as LOVE ISLAND escapes the desert and heads back to the beach. Islanders will couple up on the sundrenched Hawaiian Island where they will be ready for more texts, fireside ceremonies, challenges and friendships. And, as always viewers can vote on the Love Island app all season long, having input on who goes on dates, who's at risk from being dumped from the Island and who are fan favorites.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Things are heating up for the Islanders! The boys and girls rock their sexiest Regency era costumes as they kiss and tell during the season's first challenge: Whistleblower.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Jeremy and Trina enjoy some alone time on a date. New Islander Aimee shakes things up as she enters the villa.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Emotions run high as Aimee turns more than one boys head. Host Arielle Vandenberg shocks the Islanders when she returns to the Villa to announce the seasons first Recoupling.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: After the events of the previous night's recoupling, our Islanders welcome new boy Isaiah into the Villa. With Shannon and Josh's relationship sitting in rocky territory, Isaiah makes his interest in her known immediately. The Cashay, Cinco, and Trina love triangle gets even more complicated as the girls wonder: When will Cinco make a decision?

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: After last night's Kissing Booth game, the Islanders can't help but acknowledge the rise in tensions of all kinds. Cinco spends more time mulling over his decision between Cashay and Trina and tries not to get distracted by Lei-Yen, one of the three new Islanders to join the Villa.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: After choosing Trina, Cinco has a hard time talking to Cashay. Cashay feels disrespected by both Trina and Cinco and puts up necessary barriers. Our new Islanders choose what boys they want to take out on a date and at night the Islanders play a steamy game of Unboxed.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: After an emotionally exhausting past few days, the Islanders get to relax and have fun with a new challenge, "All Lubed Up." Important talks and last minute efforts all lead up to the night's recoupling ceremony hosted by Arielle Vandenberg. Which girls will have the chance to keep looking for love and which will get dumped from the island?

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: At the height of the double elimination fallout, we drop a couple of bombshells, as two new boys join the villa.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The next Recoupling of the season is here and with the Ceremony quickly approaching, Islanders make their final efforts to lock down a place in the Villa. Cashay struggles with being a deciding factor, Aimee has her best interest at heart, and Florita finally comes to a decision between Islanders Korey and Jeremy.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: After last night's recoupling, Florita makes a point to let Korey know where her feelings are. Olivia and Cashay agree to go for the gold and get their man, all pride aside. After a round of "Mr. & Mrs." the couples may realize they don't know each other all that well.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Operation Heart Attack is the talk of The Villa as Cashay and Olivia confess their long harboured feelings to Cinco and Will respectively. Will words alone be enough to sway the boys into their arms? As if there wasn't enough to think about, the Islanders are put on the chopping block with a shocking visit from Arielle Vandenberg for a sudden elimination.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Thankful for the distraction after a tough night, the Islanders give their all in a battle of the sexes in "The Love Island Games." And the action doesn't stop there! Our favorite love triangle is still at work as Cinco tries to figure out what side of him he likes better: The side that's in a couple with Trina or The side that wants to couple with Cashay.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Say hello to five new girls, and five new boys. It's the return of Casa Amour. The couples will be divided and face ultimate temptation. Who will stay and who will stray?

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: The Villa and Casa Amor are full of hot people and emotions; emotions are being carefully weighed by the islanders.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Final conversations are had as our Islanders prepare for the next recoupling; Isabel feels like Korey isn't giving her any clarity; Shannon and Kyra feel like their time on Love Island rests in the palms of Josh and Will's hands.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: The Recoupling left our Islanders a little worse for wear and it doesn't look like they're catching a break anytime soon. Kyra questions how much she can trust Will after a confession of what he was up to when she was away at Casa Amor. Cinco puts an end to the love triangle and makes his feelings for Cashay known. Trina tries to cope with another lost love.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: The Villa could use a good pick-me-up and it gets just that in the form of Smooch, Marry, Pie, the game our Islanders will play to get to know each other even better. The boys dish about the new girls and the vibe they bring to the Villa and the night time hangout brings new tensions.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Our Islanders find resolutions to last night's drama and take the new day to move on. Cashay and Cinco gain some added tension between them before Cashay settles on a final decision and Cinco admits that if he doesn't have Cashay, he's not going to force any new relationships. At night, the Islanders have fun letting loose with "Hearts on Fire" as they get to strip for each other and see who gets whose heart racing. Arielle Vandenberg returns for another elimination round which, of course, sparks different tensions and raises emotions throughout The Villa. Shannon and Will express their true feelings towards one another and three new girls pull their top two boys for a late night dinner date.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Though their romance is somewhat new, Olivia starts to worry about losing Korey to new Islander, Bailey. Kyra lets the girls know where they should stand when it comes to her relationship with Will and Alana and Elly pick up and something being off between Cashay and Charlie.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Shannon and Josh get a text that whisks them away on their first date; Korey gives Bailey attention leaving Olivia to think that their romance has burned out; Charlie gets to know Alana better and makes a decision on his relationship.

The islanders spend the night getting to know their two new boys; Charlie expresses interest in Alana and is happy to hear his feelings are reciprocated; K-Ci and Andre get to take their girl of their choice out on a date.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: After her date with Andre, Olivia starts to feel torn between him and Korey - a fact that excites Islander Bailey. A panic settles over The Villa when Korey gets a text about the upcoming Recoupling and when Cashay tries to get a straight answer from Charlie he only works to confuse her more by confessing an "infatuation" towards Alana. At the Recoupling that night, shocking decisions are made and one Islanders says a final goodbye to Love Island.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: The Islanders hop on down the bunny trail in The Villa game, 'The Fast and The Furriest'. That night, Arielle Vandenberg returns to reveal the couples with the most potential.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: The Islanders air out piles of 'Dirty Laundry' in today's challenge. Kyra starts to seriously question her relationship with Will.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Each islander gets a one-on-one chat with their family while also getting time to introduce the other half of their couple; the islanders' families are mostly approving and ready to welcome new faces into their homes, except Kyra's father.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Kyra and Will struggle with the fact that Kyra's family is not 100% approving; the islanders enter couples therapy and ask questions while the others watch on and vote on if the responses are lies; the islanders say goodbye to one couple.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: The islanders spend one of their last days in The Villa going out on extravagant and beautiful dates.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: The islanders play "Race To The Altar" and the winning couple scores a bonus night in The Hideaway; the four couples gather for a brunch and reflect on the relationships they've formed; the winners of Love Island are announced.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The Islanders enter the villa and start a journey to find love as they couple up for the first time.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Connections get steamy as the Islanders reveal their secrets playing "Ship Happens."

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Val and Mady each choose a boy to couple up with; the Islanders play "Truth or Dare."

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: New boy Tyler shakes things up; the Islanders play a "Kissing Booth" game.

episodes.name: Episode 5: Week 1 Recap
episodes.overview: Recapping the Islanders' first week at the villa coupling up and participating in sexy challenges.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: As the boys choose who they want to couple up with, one girl is dumped from the island.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The Islanders play the "Tag Teamed" challenge with special guest Dolph Ziggler; sibling bombshells Bria and Chazz enter the villa.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: After America's vote, Bria and Chazz go on their dates; a surprise leaves two Islanders single.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The Islanders live with the consequences of the sibling steal and vote on who goes home. Two new boys are ready to shake up the villa.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: As Jeff and Bryce enter the villa, the love triangle between Zeta, Timmy and Bria intensifies. In a dramatic recoupling, we are left wondering which boy leaves the villa.

episodes.name: Episode 11: Unseen Bits
episodes.overview: An exclusive look at the best unseen moments from another rollercoaster week in paradise.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Islanders find out how well they know their other halves in the “Mr. and Mrs.” challenge.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Deb and Jesse go on their first date; Sarah Hyland surprises the villa with an unexpected visit.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: The Islanders must save one girl and one boy from being dumped; three new bombshells arrive.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: New arrivals Kat, Jared and Nadjha make current couples question their connections.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: The Islanders test their communication skills by playing the couples challenge, "Blasting Off."

episodes.name: Unseen Bits
episodes.overview: Juicy exclusives and hilarious moments from week three in the villa.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: The Islanders find out what America thinks of them in the challenge, "And the Award Goes To."

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: The Islanders choose which boy and girl to send home; Casa Amor begins, and new singles arrive.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: The villa takes on Casa Amor in the two challenges: "Shaken and Stirred" and "Raunchy Races."

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: As new connections form, Isaiah and Deb are torn; the Casa Amor Hideaway opens for the first time.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: As Casa Amor comes to an end, the Islanders must decide to maintain relationships or recouple.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: The fallout from the recoupling leaves some Islanders questioning their decisions.

episodes.name: Episode 24: Unseen Bits
episodes.overview: Narrator Iain Stirling shows the Islanders in a new light with the best unseen moments from Week 4.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: While Sydney tries to sort out her feelings for Isaiah, Timmy and Zeta go on their first date.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: A new boy enters the villa, and Islanders participate in the "Snog, Marry, Pie" game.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: America's vote sends shockwaves through the villa; a familiar face makes a triumphant return.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Mackenzie from Season 2 is back; the Islanders play "Hearts on Fire."

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: A girl's search for love ends when she's dumped; the Islanders throw an 80s-themed party.

episodes.name: Episode 30: Unseen Bits
episodes.overview: Narrator Iain Stirling presents unseen clips and exclusive action from Week 5 in the villa.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: Tensions rise when the Islanders hear about their relationships’ online buzz during “Let’s Face It.”

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: The Islanders get handsy in the “Peacocking” challenge; a couple spices up their relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: The couples tie the knot in the "Cake-ing Love" challenge; a vote sends two islanders packing.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: The couples test their parenting skills when they get a fake baby to look after.

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: The Islanders introduce their families to each other; a surprise dumping sends one couple home.

episodes.name: Episode 36: Unseen Bits
episodes.overview: One last round of the best and funniest unseen moments from the Islanders’ final days in the villa.

episodes.name: Episode 37
episodes.overview: The remaining couples go on their final dates; America’s votes reveal the season’s winners.

episodes.name: Episode 38: Reunion
episodes.overview: Twenty-four Islanders reunite and spill the tea on everything that happened this season.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Sarah Hyland unveils the Islanders looking to find love, but with a surprise twist.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Bergie has a surprise for the Islanders; heads turn as two new girls take two boys on dates.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Islanders play "High School Dropouts"; Sarah Hyland surprises everyone with an unexpected visit.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The Islanders attend a sexy masquerade party; couples question their connections.

episodes.name: Episode 5: Unseen Bits
episodes.overview: Narrator Iain Stirling presents unseen clips and exclusive action from Week 1 in the villa.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: As the boys choose who they want to couple up with, one girl is dumped from the island.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The Islanders play “Rescuers of the Lost Spark." One couple questions their compatibility.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The Islanders play the high stakes “Mr. and Mrs.” game hosted by VIP guest Ariana Madix.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: America’s vote for their favorite couple leaves two Islanders at risk of elimination.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The Islanders must save one person from being dumped and say goodbye to another. The Hideaway opens.

episodes.name: Episode 11: Unseen Bits
episodes.overview: Unseen moments from Week 2 including behind-the-scenes action of VIP guest Ariana Madix.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: The Islanders attend a pool party but three new bombshells crash in on the fun.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: There is tension in the villa as the new arrivals choose which Islanders to take on dates.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: A recoupling leads to one Islander’s shocking decision. The couples play “Mr. and Mrs. Lava Lava.”

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: After America’s vote, two new bombshells each go on two dates. The hideaway opens for one couple.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Drama unfolds as the two new bombshells, Imani and Mike, turn heads in the villa.

episodes.name: Episode 17: Unseen Bits
episodes.overview: Unseen fun, fooling around, fallouts and flirty chat from the nation’s favorite villa during Week 3.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: The Islanders learn what America thinks of them in a game of “Face Facts,” hosted by Maura Higgins.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: The Islanders choose one boy and one girl to send home; Casa Amor begins as new singles arrive.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: New connections form in the villa and in Casa Amor; things get steamy in a game of “Truth or Dare.”

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Casa Amor takes on the villa in “Shaking Things Up”; one boy goes on a date and gets a big surprise.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Casa Amor and the villa play a game of "Raunchy Races"; one Islander is torn between two men.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Emotions run high when the girls in Casa Amor receive a shocking video from the villa.

episodes.name: Episode 24: Unseen Bits
episodes.overview: The very best unseen action from Week 4, including outtakes from Maura Higgins playing “Face Facts.”

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: As Casa Amor ends, the Islanders must decide whether to stay loyal or recouple with someone new.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Tensions reach a boiling point following the recoupling, leaving some Islanders conflicted.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: The drama heats up as the Islanders attend “Movie Night” and find out what went on during Casa Amor.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: The drama reaches an all-time high as Sarah Hyland returns with America's vote for a savage dumping.

episodes.name: Episode 529
episodes.overview: The remaining results of America’s vote are revealed; a new bombshell rocks the villa.

episodes.name: Episode 30: Unseen Bits
episodes.overview: The funniest and sauciest antics from the Islanders in Week 5, introduced by narrator Iain Stirling.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: New arrival Scott gets to know the single girls in the villa; the Islanders play “Hearts on Fire.”

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: The Islanders keep playing "Hearts on Fire"; a girl is conflicted going into the final recoupling.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: A surprise dumping leaves the votes in the Islanders’ hands to decide which couple to send home.

episodes.name: Episode 534
episodes.overview: The Islanders receive video messages from home; the couples ponder about life outside of the villa.

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: Sarah Hyland returns with the results of America’s vote to reveal the final four couples.

episodes.name: Episode 36: Unseen Bits
episodes.overview: One last round of the best and funniest unseen moments from the Islanders’ final days in the villa.

episodes.name: Episode 37
episodes.overview: The remaining four couples go on their final dates; America’s votes reveal the season’s winners.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: New host Ariana Madix enters the villa to reveal the singles coupling up for the first time.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The Islanders begin to settle, but secret kisses are shared; the bombshells test early connections.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Drama unfolds in a game of "Higher or Lower"; Ariana Madix returns for a surprise recoupling.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Following a dramatic dumping, the Islanders play "Vacation Vixens;" relationships are reevaluated.

episodes.name: Episode 5: Aftersun
episodes.overview: Maura Higgins discusses the first week in the villa with special guests, including Ariana Madix.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Ariana Madix crashes a lingerie party with two bombshells; one couple enters the friendship zone.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The new bombshells invite boys on romantic dates; tension in the villa reaches new heights.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The bombshells' dates send the villa into a frenzy; a steal leaves two Islanders vulnerable.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The Islanders pucker up for the "Kissing Booth"; an unfamiliar smooch has the girls swooning.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The boys choose who they want to couple up with and one girl is dumped from the island.

episodes.name: Episode 11: Aftersun
episodes.overview: Maura Higgins chats with the latest dumped Islander and special guests on the villa’s second week.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: The couples compete in "Burning Love"; two Islanders are eliminated in a dramatic dumping.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: One Islander chooses whether to stay or leave; the girls are left to defend their decision.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: The villa is transformed into a nightclub for "Stick or Twist;" three bombshells crash the party.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: The new bombshells sneak away with an Islander of their choosing; drama reaches new heights.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: The boys show off in the workout-themed challenge, "Flex Appeal;" a recoupling sends one boy home.

episodes.name: Episode 17: Aftersun
episodes.overview: Maura Higgins discusses the latest drama with Ariana Madix and introduces the Casa Amor bombshells.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: The new couples spend time together; America's vote for the most compatible couple is revealed.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: The ultimate test begins as Casa Amor opens its doors; couples are tempted in "Spin the Bottle."

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Casa Amor and the villa face off in "Raunchy Races"; new connections threaten the current couples.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: The villa takes on Casa Amor in the food transfer challenge; the girls in the villa receive a video.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: As Casa Amor ends, the Islanders must decide whether to stay loyal or recouple with someone new.

episodes.name: Episode 23: Aftersun
episodes.overview: Maura, Ariana and Cely discuss the drama of Casa Amor with Kay Kay Kalore and Johnny Bananas.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Tensions reach a boiling point after the explosive recoupling that left five Islanders single.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: The Islanders find out what America thinks of them in a messy game of "You Drive Me Crazy."

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: The drama heats up as the Islanders attend "Movie Night" and find out what went on during Casa Amor.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: "Movie Night" concludes; a surprise recoupling results in three Islanders being dumped.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: The new bombshell chooses three girls for dates and makes a decision that could change everything.

episodes.name: Episode 29: Aftersun
episodes.overview: Katie Maloney joins Maura and the panel to discuss the latest breakups, make-ups and dumpings.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: The Islanders unleash their competitive spirits as they face off in a "Summer Sports Day" challenge.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: The Islanders show off their sexiest moves in "Hearts on Fire;" America's votes are revealed.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: The Islanders are tested on how well they know their partners in the game "Mr. and Mrs."

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: Three of the remaining couples have emotional reunions with their loved ones via video chat.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: The couples head to the altar in "Newlyweds"; the final four couples chosen by America are revealed.

episodes.name: Episode 35: Aftersun
episodes.overview: Maura discusses the final four couples with Ariana, Cely and last year’s winners Hannah and Marco.

episodes.name: Episode 36
episodes.overview: The remaining four couples go on their final dates; America's votes reveal the season's winners.

episodes.name: Episode 37: Reunion
episodes.overview: Ariana Madix reunites the Season 6 Islanders to discuss the most dramatic moments of the season.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: Set in Fiji, season 6 features a brand-new vibrant villa including a spicy Casa Amor and an unforgettable Hideaway. Islanders face more drama than ever before with jaw-dropping revelations, brand new couples challenges and even a few surprise guests.
